title: Stream: New albums from Memoryhouse and Nite Jewel
content:
The second full length LP from Nite Jewel, ‘One Second of Love’, is an album that slowly crept into my ‘I’m excited about this’ list of 2012. The track ‘In the Dark’ sparked it all; a dark and soulful jam that ended up being pleasing on the ear more than anything else, but then again, it’s pretty cool when music’s like that right? As an album, I wanted something that took a few more risks, both vocally and musically.

The album is now streaming via Secretly Canadian – hit play below and preorder here.

Memoryhouse, to me at least, are one of those groups that feel like they’ve been around for significantly longer than they actually have. The SubPop signed band is dropping their debut LP, ‘The Slideshow Effect’, on the February 28. If fluffy glo-fi shoe-gaze is your thing; hit play below.

The Slideshow effect drops on Feb 28 on SubPop, preorder here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
